notes.text: Little different Skill Mythic depths is amazing because ssa is almost as popular as sylvans with also golden flying fish running mythic depths as well i switched to it because OPPONENTS are naive is an they dont think about what that face down card so they get tricked into attacking an then they lose. Again i believe prov. Is a must because its discards rose lover, heavyweight etc. Always try to use mushroom because merchant is inconsistent in excavating. Lastly read the name of the deck it says it all. Happy ranked climb IM FIRST KOG in gunsdiscord
